Name: Samurai Chess
About the game: The classical game of chess... now with Samurai Warriors! Play chess against your friends (locally) or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be a real Samurai. Features: Play against the computer with 3 different difficult levels; Unlock up to 12 beautiful scenarios for you to play in; Unlock 2 more Chess Pieces, with more elaborate design and armor; Play against your friends locally or just have fun against the computer; Originally composed soundtrack to get you in the mood;
Meta Title: Samurai Chess: Apr 16, 2021, Minimol Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Samurai Chess? Check out the release date (Apr 16, 2021), developer insights from Minimol Games, and a complete game summary.
